about.title: 🏃 About Me
about.intro: Hey! I’m Laurence Chiayadi, a passionate <0>Full Stack Developer</0> who enjoys bringing ideas to life through code.
about.story: It all started when I first dabbled in programming, probably breaking more things than I built. Fast forward to today, I specialize in <0>JavaScript</0>, <0>TypeScript</0>, <0>React</0>, <0>Next.JS</0>, and <0>Django</0>, and I’m always eager to learn new technologies.
about.hobbies: When I’m not coding, you’ll find me capturing moments with my <0>Fujifilm XT-1</0> 📸, geeking out over new gadgets, or attempting to perfect my <0>Golf</0> swing! ⛳

skills.title: 🛠️ Skills
skills.workExperience: 🚀  2+ years of experience in software development.
skills.proficiency: ⚡ Proficient in ReactJS, NextJS & Django for dynamic applications.
